name: Manufacturing Northern Ireland
goal: Representative organisation for manufacturing businesses located in Northern Ireland.  Interested in business taxation, energy, skills, economic development and Brexit
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Food Safety, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: Brexit negotiations with specific interest in trade and the border in Ireland
